titles.title: Children and Family Food Relief Act of 2008
To require an immediate adjustment of the thrifty food plan to increase the benefits provided under the supplemental nutrition assistance program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 6/24/2008--Introduced. Children and Family Food Relief Act of 2008 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to increase the benefits provided under the supplemental nutrition assistance program by the earlier of the date of the enactment of this Act or October 1, 2008. (Current law requires that such adjustment be made on October 1, 2008.)
